title: Implement comprehensive concurrency control with file-based locking
description: Fix race conditions in storage operations by implementing proper file locking with automatic stale lock cleanup and re-entrant locking support

title: Improve error handling and logging throughout the system
description: Enhance error messages with actionable context and differentiate between expected concurrent scenarios and unexpected file system errors

title: Replace deprecated substr() with modern slice() method
description: Update string manipulation to use modern JavaScript APIs and remove deprecated substr usage

title: Move dynamic require() statements to top-level imports
description: Fix bundling issues by moving require('child_process') to proper ES module imports
